title: Unable to Login
body: I am unable to login to my account, I have even changed my password and all. Still nothing. Please help

replies.body: There might have been something giving your network a hard time making a connection with our login servers at the time. I've seen that some players are able to get around that by running a repair on the client, but let me know if you still can't get logged in!
i had to uninstall and redownload the game. the same thing happened to me yesterday and i lost LP and got a leaver buster
